channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Genesys CEO: How empathetic AI can scale our humanity during economic uncertainty
item.description: The future of AI isn’t just smart. It’s emotionally intelligent—and it’s good for business.

item.title: America’s nuclear talks with Iran hinge on a 68-year-old billionaire real-estate magnate
item.description: Steve Witkoff has had a close relationship with Trump for many years.

item.title: A 30-year-old AI founder who followed the FIRE movement to build wealth is now the youngest self-made woman billionaire
item.description: Lucy Guo unseated Taylor Swift with her self-made billions.

item.title: Yemen’s Houthi rebels just suffered the single deadliest attack under Trump’s command
item.description: U.S. airstrikes killed 74 people and wounded 171 others.

item.title: Nintendo announces the pre-order date and final U.S. pricing for Switch 2
item.description: Orders had been delayed due to Trump's tariffs.

item.title: Newer investors have been rewarded for buying market dips. That may not last.
Getting free financial advice from TikTok? How to avoid misleading content.
Economists share where they look for clues that a U.S. recession could be coming
Is the stock market open today? Are banks closed?
'It's just not done': Why Trump firing Powell would rock U.S. financial markets
